New Records: Zach Edey became the first rookie with a 20/10 game, shooting at least 90% from the floor
Key Match Events: Dennis Schroder had a masterclass performance with 20 points and 6 assists
Ja Morant scored 25 points and 9 assists for the Grizzlies
Others: Zach Edey had a career-high 25 points, 12 rebounds, 1 assist, 0 steals, 4 blocks, 1 turnover, 11-12 FG, 0-2 FT, 1-1 3PT, 28:41 minutes, +5 plus-minus
